name: task-manager-cloud-functions
description: Cloud Functions for Task Manager notifications and background processing

scripts.deploy:daily-summary: gcloud functions deploy dailySummary --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-topic daily-summary --region us-central1
scripts.deploy:task-reminder: gcloud functions deploy taskReminder --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-topic task-reminder --region us-central1
scripts.deploy:async-processor: gcloud functions deploy asyncTaskProcessor --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-topic async-tasks --region us-central1
